name: peekaping
tagline: A self-hosted uptime and health check monitoring tool
description: PeekAPing is a self-hosted monitoring tool for running health checks on websites and services. It provides uptime tracking, performance data, and alerting over a custom web UI.

features.title: Uptime Monitoring
features.description: Monitor availability of services and endpoints

features.title: Status Dashboard
features.description: View service status in a web interface

features.title: Notifications
features.description: Send alerts when services go down

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the monitoring tool on your own servers
